E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/16/1985
Subject: Mark Graig healing process
Mark Graig is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 4/25/1985
Subject: John Corea learns new position
John Corea has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Josef Perras
Dear Sir,
Josef Perras is doing pretty good at A !
He has an ERA of 3.41, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of John Torre
Dear Sir,
John Torre isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .245, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1985
Subject: Status of Horacio Velazquez
Dear Sir,
Horacio Velazquez has an AVG of .248 at AA !
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Joey Barker learns new position
Joey Barker has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Mauro Perez
